Reviews.Title: “Different World”
Reviews.Author: sjhan12652
Reviews.Content: You do not need many words to describe this place - total privacy and luxry are the only words you need. Totally separated from the outside world by the high walls and heavy steel gates around the small parking lot, and the only hallway which leads to the mansion from the hotel is monitored by well mannered staff 24/7. The courtyard with sky-high glass top ceiling was absolutely serene with lush plants, and the swiming pool was meticulous. Everything about the masion was extraordinary but what impressed me the most was water pressure in the shower room. Water pressure was so forceful, it did not take me more than 10 seconds to shampoo my hair. You may think I am joking. Ask me if I was not impressed by BVLGARI brand amenities in the bathroom. No, it did not impress me. Ask me if I was not impressed by a bottle of 1996 Opus 1 as a departure gift. No, it did not impress me. By the way, MGM's Fiamma Italian restaurant wine list listed a bottle of 1996 Opus 1 for over $900, if I remember correctly.

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST OF THE BEST”
Reviews.Author: KIDSWILLTRAVEL
Reviews.Content: If you have the means, or more likely the casino credit line, do not miss an opportunity to stay here. The entire place is so serene you won't even think you are in the MGM at all or even in Las Vegas for that matter. There is absolutely no hustle and bustle, you may not even see another guest. The atrium is beautiful and especially so at night with the trees lit up with clear lights. The rooms are incredible. We usually stay in a 5000 square foot villa with 2 bedrooms and indoor pool. Our kids love it. Room services are all 5 star including their immaculate housekeeping. Anything goes here, whatever you ask for, they will get you. Concierge is unbelievably accommodating. Butlers are great, they get the kids video games, snacks, send out for groceries if you want something specific. I just can't say enough about this place. Most people will never even know that it exists. The Sklylofts upstairs at MGM are nice, but if you really want sheer excellence go to the Mansion.

Reviews.Title: “Tyrone Power”
Reviews.Author: CatherineK2
Reviews.Content: Sleeping next to Tyrone Power's picture was a dream come true. Of all the hotel rooms we were destined for this one. Excellent start to our 2 weeks travel.

Reviews.Title: “R&R”
Reviews.Author: JeremyZ13
Reviews.Content: it was a bit expensive but well worth it if you have the cash!!

Reviews.Title: “Once In A Lifetime Experience~!”
Reviews.Author: janeyjan3
Reviews.Content: Unbelievable service and amenities! I couldn't believe all the flowers were freshly picked What great ornaments and decorations they display How private and secluded the Mansion is from the bustle of MGM They have surround-sound speakers Relaxing and peaceful getaway with unmatched service and hospitality

Reviews.Title: “Unbelievable!”
Reviews.Author: skkriz10
Reviews.Content: This is one of the the most luxurious places in Las Vegas as well as anywhere else in the world I've been. Stayed in a Villa with celebrity friends. Between the 6 bedrooms, living room, indoor pool & spa, gym, dining room, etc etc I felt like I had a hotel to myself! The private butler and staff were ridiculously accomodating. I only can hope my friends will take me again. Absolutely gorgeous and private hideaway in LV. 5 Stars!!!

Reviews.Title: “Magnificent!”
Reviews.Author: SWTraveler32
Reviews.Content: The Mansion at the MGM Grand is an incredible hotel experience. I have had the good fortune of staying at this property several times, and no other hotel even comes close. The service, ambiance, cleanliness, furnishings, and beautiful surroundings make this exclusive hotel heaven on earth. The staff and service is seamless, from your arrival at the airport to your farewell. The Villas are beyond words!

Reviews.Title: “Royal Treatment!”
Reviews.Author: gmoes99
Reviews.Content: I was traveling with a family who I was a nanny for and we stayed at The Mansion. The Mansion at the MGM was AMAZING! We were picked up in a Phantom and treated like royalty! Our butler and other staff were excellent to us! The rooms were quite exquisite and having our own indoor pool was the best! It was exciting knowing that Michael Jordan had stayed there just days before my arrival. The Mansion at MGM is definitely a place that makes you feel as if you are in a dream!!!! It was my first trip out to Vegas and it was such an honor to stay at The Mansion and I would highly recommend it to other travelers!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Wow. Is this place for real?”
Reviews.Author: eljuan-01
Reviews.Content: I'm a middle class guy, so not used to staying at a hotel that costs more than $500 a night (in this case $5k a night but my friend's fiancee was paying for everything...). Robin Williams was staying next door, so I guess that details the level of hotel this place is supposed to be. He was very nice to everyone and smiled a lot, but we never bothered him out of respect, though I badly wanted to ask for a picture with him :) - The bathroom(s) in this place are as big as some NYC apartments, and is just way over-the-top. Steam comes out of the showers and water comes from all angles.. This must be how Saudi princes shower every day. - There is a private bar with 24 hour bartender with an earpiece so that he "remembers" your name and favorite drink. - There are real Roy Lichtenstein lithographs hanging on the walls! Jeez, what if someone steals one??? (I'm not suggesting this but still...) - Your hot tub next to the bedroom can seat about 24 people. Literally looks like a small pool. - The TV rises out of a wooden cabinet and the remote control is in a small picture frame (my favorite part). - A small army of maids comes in every day to stock your fridge, and basically cater to your every whim. - We went clubbing on the strip (of course we did) and limos or phantoms will take you wherever you want to go. There's also an office outside with staff to make your club arrangements for you so you don't have to wait in line (there were long lines outside the more popular clubs).. - This place makes me want to be a high roller... ah, maybe in another life.

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST! Wonderful experience. WOW!”
Reviews.Author: Danni0005
Reviews.Content: This was an amazing trip. Was picked up in a new Phantom :) Staff was amazing. Butler was "at your service." We had a private indoor pool. My bathroom floor was heated :) I think that was my favorite part. Rooms were very grand. Pool beautiful Atrium was incredible. It was luxury at its finest. I love staying here.

Reviews.Title: “The Mansion is to Die for!”
Reviews.Author: MansionLover
Reviews.Content: The Mansion is one of the finest if not one the finest places in the world to stay! Even if you can stay a night, it will be an event you'll always remember! Anywhere you stay after that will be lacking in so many ways! Just glad I've been there more than once! The only problem is, there is so much to do at MGM, you can't stay in the villa long enough!

HotelInfo.Name: The Mansion at MGM Grand
HotelInfo.Address: 3799 Las Vegas Blvd. South, Las Vegas, NV 89109
